channel.title: The Azure AD Podcast
channel.description: Join the Microsoft Identity team and catch up on the latest news on Azure Active Directory and the rest of the Microsoft Entra suite.
channel.author: Microsoft Identity
channel.itunes:author: Microsoft Identity
channel.itunes:summary: Join the Microsoft Identity team and catch up on the latest news on Azure Active Directory and the rest of the Microsoft Entra suite.

item.title: Upgrading to AAD Connect v2
item.itunes:title: Upgrading to AAD Connect v2
item.description: Rob de Jong and Daniel Birmingham talk about upgrading from Azure AD Connect v1 to either Azure AD Connect v2 or the newer Azure Connect Cloud Sync.
item.content:encoded:
Links from the show:

* What is Azure AD Connect v2.0? - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Azure AD Connect: Upgrade from a previous version - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Upgrading Azure AD Connect Swing Migration

* GitHub - microsoft/AADConnectConfigDocumenter

* Azure AD Connect: Version release history - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Tutorial - Pilot Azure AD Connect cloud sync for an existing synced AD forest - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Azure AD Connect: Supported topologies - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Azure Active Directory Connect FAQ - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Azure AD Connect sync: Operational tasks and considerations - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

* Enable Azure Active Directory password writeback - Microsoft Entra | Microsoft Docs

Speakers:

* Rob de Jong - Microsoft

* Daniel Birmingham - Microsoft

Hosts:

* Bailey Bercik - Microsoft

* Mark Morowczynski - Microsoft

* Jef Kazimer - Microsoft

* Merill Fernando - Microsoft
item.dc:creator: Microsoft Identity
item.itunes:subtitle: Rob de Jong and Daniel Birmingham talk about upgrading from Azure AD Connect v1 to either Azure AD Connect v2 or the newer Azure Connect Cloud Sync.
item.itunes:author: Microsoft Identity

item.title: TeamsJS SDK Update with Alicia Lu
item.itunes:title: TeamsJS SDK Update with Alicia Lu
item.description:
In this episode Jeremy talks to Alicia Lu about the new features of the Teams JS SDK v2.0 updates that allow you to build your apps across multiple Microsoft 365 surfaces like Outlook, Office.com and Microsoft Teams.

Links from the show:
  • Extend Teams apps across Microsoft 365 (preview) - Teams
  • Build collaborative apps with Microsoft Teams and Microsoft 365 services
  • Microsoft Teams JS SDK v2 is now generally available - Microsoft 365 Developer Blog
  • GitHub - OfficeDev/microsoft-teams-library-js: JavaScript library for use by Microsoft Teams apps
  • GitHub - OfficeDev/TeamsFx: Developer tools for building Teams apps
  • https://www.linkedin.com/in/alicia-lu/
Microsoft News
  • Microsoft Ignite
  • Join us at the first Microsoft Power Platform Conference Sept 20-22
  • Introducing the Azure Developer CLI (azd): A faster way to build apps for the cloud
  • Restricted access to Microsoft Teams data via EWS starts September 30, 2022 - Microsoft 365 Developer Blog
Community Links
  • What's new? Unboxing the SharePoint Framework (SPFx) v1.15
  • My experiences and an approach to implementing Power Platform Dev Ops with the Power Platform Toolchain: Introduction
